arts.ttl: Aguirre praises Jiménez after Mexico's USMNT win
arts.sum: Mexico men's coach Javier Aguirre has praised Raul Jimenez as an important "leader" for Mexico after he collected a goal and an assist against the USMNT.

arts.ttl: Mauricio Pochettino gets blasted after falling to Mexico in his second game with USMNT
arts.sum: Some fans even posted "This is the most Pochettino thing" making reference to the 2-0 score that USA ends up sealing in the majority of their victories over Mexico. Things did not go as planned, as the USMNT lost 2-0 and criticism over new head coach Mauricio Pochettino started fast.

arts.ttl: The reasons behind Mauricio Pochettino’s USMNT loss to Mexico
arts.sum: The absences that Mauricio Pochettino and his US team faced in this match ultimately took their toll, particularly with the lack of key players such as Christian Pulisic, Weston McKennie, and two important strikers, Folarin Balogun and Ricardo Daniel Pepi. That is the question surrounding the United States national team following tonight’s events at Estadio Akron, where their dominance over Mexico came to an end.

arts.ttl: Mexico stops 7-game winless streak against the US, wins friendly 2-0 on goals by Jiménez and Huerta
arts.sum: Raúl Jiménez scored on a 22nd-minute free kick and set up César Huerta’s goal in the 49th as Mexico stopped a seven-game winless streak against the United States with a 2-0 victory on Tuesday night in Mauricio Pochettino’s second game as the American coach. Javier Aguirre won his second game since replacing Jaime Lozano as Mexico coach in August.

arts.ttl: USA soccer fans go into meltdown as Mauricio Pochettino is handed ugly first loss against bitter rival Mexico
arts.sum: Pochettino won his first game in charge of the US national team against Panama on Saturday night, but a trip to Guadalajara ended in a woeful 2-0 loss just three days later.

arts.ttl: Mexico provide update after Javier Aguirre’s hospital visit ahead of USMNT clash
arts.sum: After that, Aguirre went to the training hotel in Guadalajara, where Mexico will face the United States tonight at the Akron Stadium. Through their social media channels, the Mexican National Team announced the following: “We inform that our manager, Jav ier Aguirre, went this morning to the clinic of his friend, Dr. Rafael Ortega, to undergo a follow-up study after the back surgery he underwent last month.”

arts.ttl: USMNT possible lineup in the friendly against Mexico
arts.sum: Coming into this game, the packed schedule has put Pochettino in a tough spot, forcing him to rely on his second-string squad to face Javier ‘Vasco’ Aguirre’s Mexico. The United States Men’s National Team (USMNT) are back in action, visiting a Mexico side desperate for a win.

arts.ttl: Mexico struggles to stamp out homophobic chant ahead of the World Cup
arts.sum: A homophobic chant that has cost Mexico hundreds of thousands of dollars in fines over the past two decades

arts.ttl: When is Mexico vs USA? Times, how to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: T he upcoming match against the United States is an opportunity for Mexico to redeem themselves, and it will take place at Akron Stadium, where they haven’t played in 14 years. At what time is the Mexico vs United States, Friendly Match played?

arts.ttl: AS Monaco’s Folarin Balogun set for two-month absence
arts.sum: AS Monaco have been dealt a blow with Folarin Balogun (23) ruled out for two months with a shoulder injury, as reported by L’Équipe. The former Arsenal forward netted in the…
